actions.description: The hobgoblin makes two Quarterstaff or Devastating Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) force damage.
actions.name: Quarterstaff

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) force damage, and the target is knocked prone.
actions.name: Devastating Bolt

actions.description:
The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: mage hand, prestidigitation

2/day each: fireball, fly, fog cloud, gust of wind, lightning bolt
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.
specialTraits.name: Army Arcana
